Product Id: As of January 2004, the major airlines include WestJet and Air Canada
As of April 2014, Air Canada data include Air Canada rouge.
As of January 2015, the major airlines include all Canadian Level I air carriers, which are comprised of Air Canada (including Air Canada rouge), Air Transat, Jazz, Porter, Sunwing and WestJet.
As of July 2018, WestJet data include Swoop, WestJet Encore and WestJet Link.
From January 2020 until March 2021, inclusive, the major airlines also include Sky Regional Airlines.
